description: Isango lakho lokukhanya ikusasa. Lapha e-Oasis Yezithuba, sizinikele ekubhekaneni nendaba ebalulekile yokuntuleka kwemisebenzi kubantu abasha. Sihlose ukuvimbela umehluko phakathi kwemfundo nokuqashwa. Iwebhusayithi yethu ebanzi ihlelwe ukusiza abafundi abasha kanye nabaqalayo ngemininingwane, izinsiza, kanye nosizo abakulindele ukuba balwe kahle emakethe yomsebenzi ezinzima.
